Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.driver.connectpolicy

Class Summary
AbstractControllerConnectPolicy This class defines an AbstractControllerConnectPolicy used by the driver to choose a controller to connect to.
ControllerPingThread This class defines a ControllerPingThread that periodically tries to connect to a failed controller to check if it is back online.
OrderedConnectPolicy This class defines an OrderedConnectPolicy used when the C-JDBC URL has the following form: jdbc:cjdbc://node1,node2,node3/myDB?
PreferredListConnectPolicy This class defines a PreferredListConnectPolicy
RandomConnectPolicy This class defines a RandomConnectPolicy used when the C-JDBC URL has the following form: jdbc:cjdbc://node1,node2,node3/myDB?
RoundRobinConnectPolicy This class defines a RoundRobinConnectPolicy used when the C-JDBC URL has the following form: jdbc:cjdbc://node1,node2,node3/myDB?
SingleConnectPolicy This class defines a SingleConnectPolicy used when a C-JDBC URL only contains one controller.
